contents:
Q.日本周邊國家中，國境發生重大改變的國家有麼？
A.國境發生重大改變的國家就是印度了。 （2010/11/14）
Q.日本和印度的關係如何？
A.日本和印度的關係非常友好。 （2010/11/14）


DW观众：21世纪？那你不说38世纪“印日合并”？

DOCTOR: Indo-Japanese. Thirty eighth century.
CLARA: Thirty eighth century?
DOCTOR: Hmm. After the Great Catastrophe, there was a tectonic realignment. India and Japan, they were sort of merged.
--from "Sleep No More", Series 9 Episode 9
